title: Husqvarna launches 2024 editions of Svartpilen 401, Vitpilen 250 in India. Price, technical specifications
description: Husqvarna 2024 edition of Svartpilen 401, Vitpilen 250 price in India:  Bajaj Auto has launched 2024 models of Husqvarna Motorcycles Svartpilen 401 and Vitpilen 250  in the Indian market. These redesigned models showcase new engines, chassis, advanced technology, and updated styling. The Svartpilen 401, a dynamic Scrambler, boasts a potent 399 cc 45 HP engine. Meanwhile, the Vitpilen 250, an urban Roadster, features a new 249 cc 31 HP engine, premium paint finish, WP suspension, Bosch ABS, and an LCD display.  The Svartpilen 401 is priced at Rs. 2,92,000 ex-showroom Delhi, while the Vitpilen 250 is available at Rs. 2,19,000 ex-showroom Delhi.
